entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
